<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>75833</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>39e60692-0ccb-407e-b7b1-83ce1220e014#1#1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Fehér ruhás kuruc huszárok</string>
            <string language="en">Kuruc hussars in white</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kuruc hussars im Weiß</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Hussars de Kuruc dans le blanc</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Hussars de Kuruc no branco</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Hussars di Kuruc nel bianco</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ουσάροι Kuruc στο λευκό</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Hussars de Kuruc en blanco</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Piros süveg, fehér ruhás lovas és gyaloghuszár, piros tarsoly (1-4)</string>
            <string language="en">Red high cap, horseman dressed in white and foot-hussar, red haversack (1-4)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">fehér ruha kutyafül lóding,  </string>
            <string language="en">white dress dog ear shoulder-strap</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rote hohe Schutzkappe, Reiter gekleidet im Weiß 
und Fuß-hussar, rotes haversack (1-4)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Haut chapeau rouge, cavalier habillé dans le 
blanc et pied-hussar, haversack rouge (1-4)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tampão elevado vermelho, horseman vestido no 
branco e pé-hussar, haversack vermelho (1-4)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Alta protezione rossa, horseman vestito nel bianco
e piede-hussar, haversack rosso (1-4)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κόκκινη υψηλή ΚΑΠ, ιππέας που ντύνονται στο λευκό και
πόδι-ουσάρος, κόκκινο haversack (14)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Casquillo alto rojo, jinete vestido en blanco y 
pie-hussar, haversack rojo (1-4)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">weiße Kleidhundeohr Schulter-Brücke</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">épaule-courroie blanche d'oreille de chien de robe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ombro-cinta branca da orelha do cão do vestido</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">spalla-cinghia bianca dell'orecchio del cane dal 
vestito</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">άσπρο ώμος-λουρί αυτιών σκυλιών φορεμάτων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">hombro-correa blanca del oído del perro de la alineada</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:Panem Kiadó
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>590</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>75833</entry>

    <name>
